trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class that defines an action to be executed if the associated <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Condition" /> evaluates to <see langword="true" />, for <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions" />, or <see langword="false" />, for <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una classe astratta che definisce un'azione da eseguire se la classe <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Condition" /> associata restituisce <see langword="true" />, per <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions" /> o <see langword="false" />, per <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions" />.

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: La classe deve essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> objects (which can be used as both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> (che possono essere usati sia come <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> sia come <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) in genere impostano un valore variabile in una delle proprietà dell'attività, chiamano un metodo dell'attività o chiamano metodi statici sui tipi negli assembly a cui si fa riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> is the base type that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> classes derive from.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> è il tipo base da cui derivano <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>.

trans-unit.source: The uses of these classes is as follows:
trans-unit.target: Gli utilizzi di queste classi sono i seguenti:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
trans-unit.target: Una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifica una proprietà o chiama un metodo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> fa sì che la classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> interrompa l'esecuzione e restituisca il controllo al metodo di chiamata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: Una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> indica in modo esplicito che una regola sta aggiornando una variabile.

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: Provoca la rivalutazione di qualsiasi regola modificata.

trans-unit.source: The following code creates an action that can be used in rule sets.
trans-unit.target: Il codice seguente crea un'azione che può essere utilizzata nei set di regole.

trans-unit.source: The action is named `Log`, and takes a single parameter, which must evaluate to a string.
trans-unit.target: L'azione è denominata `Log` e prende un solo parametro che deve restituire una stringa.

trans-unit.source: This action outputs the string to the Console.
trans-unit.target: Questa azione restituisce la stringa alla console.

trans-unit.source: To use this code, add it to a Class Library project and reference the library from your workflow project.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare questo codice, aggiungerlo a un progetto Libreria di classi e fare riferimento alla libreria dal progetto flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia completa dell'oggetto corrente della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> identica all’istanza.

trans-unit.source: The runtime state that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> is executing in.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato runtime in cui la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> è in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Esegue la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> utilizzando l'istanza <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> that was used previously in a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> precedentemente utilizzata in una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce le proprietà e i campi aggiornati da una classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that represent the names of fields and properties that are changed by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di stringhe che rappresentano i nomi dei campi e delle proprietà modificate da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> per la gestione del processo di convalida.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Verifica che l'oggetto della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> è configurato correttamente ed è privo di errori.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> validated correctly and has no errors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per verificare che la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> sia stata convalidata correttamente e sia priva di errori. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> contiene errori (il metodo `Validate` restituisce `false`), la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> conterrà l'elenco degli errori che si sono verificati.
